page.title: 17GLASCOED DIARY
page.content: Glascoed villagers attend social functions organised by the village social committee.A party for adults and children is held to begin the New Year.Spring and summer activities include walks and treasure hunts. In September our main event is Glascoed Expo.which takes the form of a horticultural show,displays and demonstrations of local craft also being staged with sideshows for more entertainment.A Bonfire Party held in November brings the year's events to a close. Winter evening classes ceased this year because the school building in which they were held closed in February 1985.The future of some social functions is in doubt as there are inadequate facilities to cater for the number of residents.
